VLT Pack Maven Plugin
Project Documentation

vltpack:vault-inf

Full name:

net.adamcin:vltpack-maven-plugin:1.0-SNAPSHOT:vault-inf

Description:

(no description)

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: prepare-package.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
bundleInstallPath String - (no description)
Default value is: /apps/bundles/install/30.
createDefinition boolean - (no description)
definitionProperties Map - (no description)
packageDependencies List - (no description)
properties Map - (no description)
screenshots List - (no description)
thumbnail File - (no description)
user String - (no description)
Default value is: admin.
User property is: vlt.user.
vaultSource File - (no description)
Default value is: ${project.build.outputDirectory}/META-INF/vault.
